org.spongepowered.api.plugin

Annotation Type Plugin


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Plugin
    An annotation used to describe and mark a Sponge plugin.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String id
      An ID for the plugin to be used internally.
      java.lang.String name
      The human readable name of the plugin as to be used in descriptions and similar things.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String dependencies
      A simple dependency string for this mod separated by a ";" example:
      java.lang.String version
      The version of the plugin.

    • Element Detail

      • id

        public abstract java.lang.String id
        An ID for the plugin to be used internally. The ID should be unique as to not conflict with other plugins.
        Returns:
        The plugin identifier

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The human readable name of the plugin as to be used in descriptions and similar things.
        Returns:
        The plugin name

      • version

        public abstract java.lang.String version
        The version of the plugin.
        Returns:
        The plugin version
        Default:
        "unknown"

      • dependencies

        public abstract java.lang.String dependencies
        A simple dependency string for this mod separated by a ";" example: 
        "required-after:Sponge@[1.2.3.2222,);required-after:myLibraryPlugin;after:towny;before:worldguard"
        supported options:
        after
        when present this plugin will run after plugin x
        required-after
        plugin x must be present, load after plugin x
        before
        when present run before plugin x
        required-before
        plugin x must be present, load before plugin x
        supports maven version ranges after @ in any field
        Returns:
        The plugin dependencies
        Default:
        ""
